EncryptionService - Class in jade.core.security.encryption
Implementation of the EncryptionService, which role is to encrypt or decrupt messages before they are delivered to agents Incoming messages: must have been previously verified by the SignatureService and need then to be decoded by the EncodingService Outgoing messages: must have been encoded by the EncodingService and need then to be signed by the SignatureService

JADEUserAuthenticator - Interface in jade.core.security.authentication
